name: MPMusicPlayerPlayParametersQueueDescriptor
desc: A set of properties and methods used to modify how items are played, based on play parameters returned from MusicKit API results.

items.name: init(playParametersQueue: [MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters])
items.desc: Creates a new queue descriptor using the designated queue of play parameters.

items.name: class MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters
items.desc: The MusicKit parameters that describe items to be played.

items.name: var playParametersQueue: [MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters]
items.desc: An array containing the play parameters returned from querying MusicKit.

items.name: var startItemPlayParameters: MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters?
items.desc: The item identified by the play parameters that is to be played first.

items.name: class MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters
items.desc: The MusicKit parameters that describe items to be played.

items.name: func setStartTime(TimeInterval, forItemWith: MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters)
items.desc: Sets the time the item with the associated play parameters is to start playing.

items.name: func setEndTime(TimeInterval, forItemWith: MPMusicPlayerPlayParameters)
items.desc: Sets the time the item with the associated play parameters is to stop playing.
